concept.title: DITA Projects
concept.shortdesc: Projects make you able of organizing both content and workflow by providing a unifying framework and container.

conbody.p: Once you have a basic understanding of DITA and how to work with DITA topics and maps, you probably want to create a DITA project to organize and manage your planned content/resources. Oxygen XML Editor includes a Project view that helps you organize your projects and offers a variety of helpful project-related features and makes it easy to share your projects with other members of your team.
